# `<dso-dropdown-button>`

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                      | Type                                     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`   | `label`   | The text of the dropdown button.                                                 | `string`                                 | `""`        |
| `open`    | `open`    | Whether the dropdown is open or closed. This attribute is reflected and mutable. | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `variant` | `variant` | The button style variant                                                         | `"primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary"` | `"primary"` |
